item.description:
Sound Bath

Please arrive 15 minutes early so we can start on time.

Bring and a yoga mat with either a blanket or sleeping bag to be wrapped up like a butterfly in its cocoon waiting for its transformation. ( we also have mats and blankets available if needed)

Come experience our 90 minute sound bath healing sessions for deep relaxation and rejuvenation. Using sacred instruments, your body will be bathed in exquisite sound, resulting in waves of peace, heightened awareness and relaxation of the mind, body and soul. Crystal bowls, Tibetan bowls, drumming, gongs, tuning forks, our own voices and much more will be used during the session. The instruments are played intuitively and inspirationally while linking with the energies of everyone in the room.  The affect of these very resonant and powerful sounds really have to be witnessed as there are no words to describe them     ....it just has to be experienced!

The sound bath is often described like being awake within a dream, but everyone's experience is different and every individual sound bath is unique.

A Sound Bath is a powerful experience designed to shift you out of worry and stress back into Joy, Deep Peace and Connection to Who You Really Are.

This is a chance to experience sound healing for yourself. There will be a short introduction to how it works, then we’ll dive into the Sound Bath, with some time for questions and socializing afterward.

Facilitated by Darnell Nestor and Sharon Colvin (7:30-9pm the 4th Wed. of the month)
item.name: Shanti Shala Sound Bath (Healing yourself in the vibration of sound)
